Source code for kexp.util.increment_run_id

import os

try:
    DATA_DIR = os.getenv("data")
    RUN_ID_PATH = os.path.join(DATA_DIR,"run_id.py")
except:
    pass



[docs]
def update_run_id():
    pwd = os.getcwd()
    os.chdir(DATA_DIR)
    with open(RUN_ID_PATH,'r') as f:
        rid = int(f.read())
    with open(RUN_ID_PATH,'w') as f:
        line = f"{rid+1}"
        f.write(line)
    os.chdir(pwd)



if __name__ == "__main__":
    update_run_id()
